Mum told to drive cheaper car after trying to reduce ‘unaffordable’ child support https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mum-told-to-drive-cheaper-car-after-trying-to-reduce-unaffordable-child-support/3VG2X2QUH5FLBCNKCCU3QIPZNY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mum-told-to-drive-cheaper-car-after-trying-to-reduce-unaffordable-child-support/3VG2X2QUH5FLBCNKCCU3QIPZNY/ Tracy NealThe judge noted she drove a four-wheel drive vehicle when there were cheaper cars to run. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:00:00 +0000 A mother who sought a reduction in the amount of child support she had to pay was told by a judge she could reduce her living costs by driving a cheaper vehicle and mowing her own lawn.

Fri, 16 Feb 2024 19:47:04 +0000 Cooper McLennan was diagnosed in 2020 with Perthes’ disease, which stopped him from participating in sports. Inset top right: Cooper with sisters Isabella, 13, Hazel, 1, mum Jalisa and dad Chris. Inset below: An x-ray of Cooper’s hip.
